code:
```verilog
module TopModule(
    input [7:0] a,
    input [7:0] b,
    input [7:0] c,
    input [7:0] d,
    output logic [7:0] min
);
    always @(*) begin
        if (a < b && a < c && a < d) begin
            min = a;
        end else if (b < c && b < d) begin
            min = b;
        end else if (c < d) begin
            min = c;
        end else begin
            min = d;
        end
    end
endmodule
```
